LanguageData.Anesthetic.label: anestesia
LanguageData.Anesthetic.description: Sleep drugs in the bloodstream. Anesthetic renders creatures unconscious.
LanguageData.Anesthetic.stages.wearing_off.label: wearing off
LanguageData.Anesthetic.stages.woozy.label: woozy
LanguageData.Anesthetic.stages.sedated.label: sedated
LanguageData.BloodLoss.label: pérdida de sangre
LanguageData.BloodLoss.description: A reduction in the normal blood volume. Minor blood loss has relatively mild effects, but when blood loss becomes severe, oxygen transport becomes badly impaired and the victim loses the ability to move. Extreme blood loss leads to death.\n\nBlood loss naturally recovers over time as the body slowly regenerates its blood supply.
LanguageData.BloodLoss.stages.minor-0.label: trivial
LanguageData.BloodLoss.stages.minor-1.label: ligera
LanguageData.BloodLoss.stages.moderate.label: moderada
LanguageData.BloodLoss.stages.severe.label: grave
LanguageData.BloodLoss.stages.extreme.label: extrema
LanguageData.BrainShock.label: brain shock
LanguageData.BrainShock.description: After-effects of an electrical shock to the brain. This is generally cause by feedback from brain implants hit by EMP pulses.
LanguageData.CatatonicBreakdown.label: colapso catatónico
LanguageData.CatatonicBreakdown.description: A state of mental shock which leads to a total inability to function. The victim collapses, effectively unconscious.
LanguageData.CryptosleepSickness.label: enfermedad del criptosueño
LanguageData.CryptosleepSickness.description: After-effects of using a cryptosleep pod. Cryptosleep suspends and replaces many bodily functions in order to prevent aging and death. Upon exiting cryptosleep, the body takes time to restart and rebalance its natural metabolic processes. While this is ongoing, the patient suffers from nausea, dizziness, and a sense of fuzziness in the mind.
LanguageData.DrugOverdose.label: sobredosis
LanguageData.DrugOverdose.description: Generalized toxic effects due to over-concentration of drugs in the bloodstream.
LanguageData.DrugOverdose.stages.minor-0.label: leve
LanguageData.DrugOverdose.stages.minor-1.label: media
LanguageData.DrugOverdose.stages.major.label: grave
LanguageData.FoodPoisoning.label: intoxicación alimentaria
LanguageData.FoodPoisoning.description: Gastrointestinal illness caused by consuming decayed or unclean food. It can be caused by eating rotten food, by incompetent cooks accidentally poisoning meals, or by eating from unsafe wild sources. The patient will vomit and feel sick for some time.
LanguageData.FoodPoisoning.stages.recovering.label: convaleciente
LanguageData.FoodPoisoning.stages.major.label: grave
LanguageData.FoodPoisoning.stages.initial.label: inicial
LanguageData.HeartAttack.label: ataque cardíaco
LanguageData.HeartAttack.description: A disruption in the heart's normal beating rhythm. Heart attacks can be debilitatingly painful. They can worsen and lead to death, or recover.
LanguageData.HeartAttack.stages.painful.label: considerable
LanguageData.HeartAttack.stages.debilitating.label: leve
LanguageData.HeartAttack.stages.fatal.label: mortal
LanguageData.Pregnant.label: embarazada
LanguageData.Pregnant.description: This creature is gestating offspring. It will give birth if the pregnancy comes to term. If starved or injured, there may be a miscarriage.
LanguageData.Pregnant.stages.earlystage.label: primer trimestre
LanguageData.Pregnant.stages.middlestage.label: segundo trimestre
LanguageData.Pregnant.stages.latestage.label: tercer trimestre
LanguageData.PsychicHangover.label: psychic hangover
LanguageData.PsychicHangover.description: An after-effect of psychic entropy. Psychic hangover is bothersome, but not dangerous.
LanguageData.PsychicHangover.stages.forming.label: forming
LanguageData.PsychicHangover.stages.buzzing.label: buzzing
LanguageData.PsychicShock.label: shock psíquico
LanguageData.PsychicShock.description: A state of psychic chaos in the brain and mind. Caused by psychic attacks or critical level of psychic entropy, this effect is debilitating until it wears off.
LanguageData.ResurrectionSickness.label: mareo por resurrección
LanguageData.ResurrectionSickness.description: After-effects of being resurrected by mechanite injection. Artificially-kickstarted body processes take time to rebalance themselves.
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.label: acumulación tóxica
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.description:
Poison in the bloodstream. This can come from various sources, including environmental toxins, venomous bites, or poisoned weapons.

At high doses, toxic buildup is lethal. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers.

Creatures who die with toxic buildup cannot be eaten.
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.stages.initial-0.label: fase inicial
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.stages.initial-1.label: inicial
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.stages.minor.label: ligera
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.stages.moderate.label: moderada
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.stages.serious.label: grave
LanguageData.ToxicBuildup.stages.extreme.label: extrema
